import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav', templateUrl: './nav.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav.component.css'] }) export class NavComponent implements OnInit { isCollapsed = true; constructor(private router: Router) { } ngOnInit() { } showMenu(): boolean{ return this.router.url != '/user/login'; } }
